body:
I really need a intro I was wondering if any of you guys are any good at making intros for YouTube channels cause I really want one please my name is ElementPro on youtube !

link to one of my videos http://youtu.be/-gOABHdMGUg

title: Need YouTube intro !!!

replies.body: Win one from Tynvale. Participate and get #1 in his Top 5 Plays.
replies.body_tagged: Win one from Tynvale. Participate and get #1 in his Top 5 Plays.

replies.body: Some of my good videos are too long to send to him because I got about 10 per recorded videos !
replies.body_tagged: Some of my good videos are too long to send to him because I got about 10 per recorded videos !

replies.body: TYNVALE made an AMAZING intro for me on my channel on my latest video.. Sam Does Gamez is my youtube so check out the intro he made for me there!
replies.body_tagged: TYNVALE made an AMAZING intro for me on my channel on my latest video.. Sam Does Gamez is my youtube so check out the intro he made for me there!
